/*
 * BEGIN MATERIAL BLOCK
 */
% helium
mat 5 -0.0015981

/*
 * BEGIN GEOMETRY BLOCK
 */
surf 1_r0 inf
cell 1_r0 1 1 -1_r0
pin p1
fill 1 0.3921800
5 0.4000500
3 0.4572000
4

pin p3
4 0.5041900
3 0.5641000
4

surf 2_r3 inf
cell 2_r3 6 6 -2_r3
pin p2
2 0.2140000
7 0.2305000
5 0.2413000
fill 6 0.4267000
5 0.4369000
7 0.4839000
4 0.5613000
3 0.6020000
4

lat cl4 1 0.0 0.0 2 2 1.30000
p3 p2
p1 p1

surf 4_x rect -1.30000 1.30000 -1.30000 1.30000
cell 4_1 0 fill cl4 -4_x
cell 4_2 0 outside 4_x
/*
 * BEGIN SETTINGS BLOCK
 */
set acelib "ACELIB"
set declib "DECLIB"
set nfylib "NFYLIB"
set pop 200 25 10 1.00000 % 5
set bc 2 2 2
therm HinH2O_600.00 lwe6.12t
% Hard set one group [0, 20] MeV for all data
ene energies 2 1 0 20
set nfg energies
